title: Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 5 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site The Authors of St. Paul's      Time: 1:00 PM Location: 897 S. Columbus Av., Mt. Vernon, NY Fees: FREE     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 A presentation about three writes who are buried at St. Paul's. View Details      Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site NPS Centennial Program      Location: 897 South Columbus Avenue  Mount Vernon, NY 10550 Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 In recognition of the centennial of the National Park Service, join us for a digital presentation that explores the interesting story of the transition of St. Paul’s from a church to a Park site in the 1970s. View Details      Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site America and World War I      Time: 7:00 PM Location: 897 S. Columbus Av., Mt. Vernon, NY Fees: FREE     Thursday, September 1, 2016 An exploration of the American experience in the Great War View Details      Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site Labor Day Commemoration      Time: 11:30 AM to 4:00 PM Location: 897 S. Columbus Av., Mt. Vernon, NY Fees: FREE     Monday, September 5, 2016 A recognition of this traditional holiday which salutes America's workers View Details      Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site The Press and the Public Leaders      Time: 1:00 PM Location: 897 S. Columbus Av., Mt. Vernon, NY Fees: FREE     Saturday, September 10, 2016 A leading professor of the history of journalism explores the story of the press and politics in America. View Details
